question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: In quale parte della penisola iberica si trova Teruel, in Spagna?
answer: Teruel si trova nella parte nord-orientale della penisola iberica, nella comunit√† autonoma dell'Aragona, in Spagna.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the north-eastern part of the Iberian Peninsula, in the autonomous community of Aragon, Spain.
